text: Information, Communication & Society is a peer-reviewed academic journal covering the role of digital media in the Information Age. It was established in 1998 and is published by Routledge. The editor-in-chief is Brian Loader (University of York). According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2018 impact factor of 4.124, ranking it 4th out of 88 journals in the category "Communication" and 5th out of 148 journals in the category "Sociology". ==References== ==External links== * Category:Routledge academic journals Category:Information science journals Category:Media studies journals Category:Publications established in 1998 Category:English-language journals Category:Journals published between 13 and 25 times per year
